meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Exhibit</kanji> your <kanji>feeling</kanji>s in a <vocabulary>petition</vocabulary>. If you feel something is unjust you have to say something. Form an <vocabulary>appeal</vocabulary> and fight back!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
